attributes.comment:
I would like to join the thousands of adoptive parents petitioning to stop this from happening.
This process is long and costly already-- they have raised the fees a few years ago, the service
and process itself did not improve.

It is truly a shame that the cost to give a child a home and a family should and does drive people
away-- or forces them to make other sacrifices in the qualitly of their life--when the only one who
suffers is the child --who continues to wait and wait and wait for somewhere to call home--not the
folks making or changing the rules and fees.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Dr. Gale Lavinder
